trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the account and contact data common to principals that can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 封装共有可以进行身份验证的主体的客户和联系人数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref> class by using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref>通过使用指定的上下文的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended for use directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数由派生类构造函数来初始化类的基类，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class.
trans-unit.target: 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生的类构造函数初始化基类调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[主体扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref> class by using the specified context, SAM account name, password, and enabled value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref>类通过使用指定的上下文，SAM 帐户名、 密码和启用的值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended for use directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数由派生类构造函数来初始化类的基类，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class.
trans-unit.target: 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生的类构造函数初始化基类调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[主体扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: The SAM account name for this principal.
trans-unit.target: 此主体 SAM 帐户名。

trans-unit.source: The password for this account.
trans-unit.target: 此帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies whether the account is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否启用了帐户。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the date and time that the account expires.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个可以为 Null <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定的日期和时间，该帐户将过期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。</xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the AccountExpirationDate, the time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 当设置奇特方法时，时间将默认为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to write in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:DateTimeKind.Local>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要编写本地时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>你<xref:System.DateTime>为<xref:DateTimeKind.Local>。</xref:DateTimeKind.Local>对象</xref:System.DateTime>属性</xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the date and time that the account expires, or null if the account never expires.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定的日期和时间，该帐户将过期或为 null 如果帐户永不过期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可以为 Null <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定的日期和时间，该帐户已被锁定。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The account lockout time is system dependent, and cannot be set by the Account Management API.
trans-unit.target: 帐户锁定时间取决于系统，并不能通过帐户管理 API 设置。

trans-unit.source: To unlock the account, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.UnlockAccount%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要解锁帐户，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.UnlockAccount%2A>方法。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.UnlockAccount%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is possible that an account may not be locked out when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A> returns a non-null value.
trans-unit.target: 可以帐户可能不会被锁定时<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A>返回一个非 null 值。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications should use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.IsAccountLockedOut%2A> method to determine whether the account is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.IsAccountLockedOut%2A>方法来确定该帐户锁定。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.IsAccountLockedOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。</xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out, or null if no lockout time is set on the account.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定的日期和时间，该帐户已被锁定或为 null 的帐户上不设置任何锁定时间如果。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter> object, for use with [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) to set read-only properties before passing the object to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter>对象，以用于[查询的示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)传递到对象之前设置只读属性<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"> </xref>。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter>

trans-unit.source: See the [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) documentation for examples.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[查询的示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)有关示例的文档。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter>对象。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedSearchFilter>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether reversible password encryption is enabled for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否为此帐户启用可逆的密码加密。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if reversible password encryption is enabled for this account; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果为此帐户; 启用可逆的密码加密否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of logon attempts using incorrect credentials for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取为此帐户使用的凭据不正确的登录尝试次数。

trans-unit.source: The number of logon attempts using incorrect credentials for this account.
trans-unit.target: 的登录尝试次数为此帐户使用的凭据不正确。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> that contains the X509 certificates for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref>包含 X509 证书为此帐户。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> that contains the X509 certificates for this account.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref>包含 X509 证书为此帐户。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Changes the account password from the old password to the new password.
trans-unit.target: 从旧密码的帐户密码更改为新的密码。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this with a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 不使用此操作与<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended for computer principals.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不适合于计算机的主体。

trans-unit.source: Calling this with a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal> will cause a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 调用此操作与<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>将导致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The password that is changed.
trans-unit.target: 更改密码。

trans-unit.source: The new password.
trans-unit.target: 新密码。

trans-unit.source: The principal has not been persisted.
trans-unit.target: 主体未持久化。

trans-unit.source: The new password does not meet the complexity requirements.
trans-unit.target: 新密码不符合复杂性要求。

trans-unit.source: The principal is not a user.
trans-unit.target: 主体不是用户。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether the account may be delegated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个可以为 Null 的布尔值，指定是否可以委派帐户。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the account may be delegated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可能委派的帐户;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个可以为 Null 的布尔值，指定是否为身份验证启用此帐户。

trans-unit.source: If the principal has not been persisted in the store, this property returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果不将该主体保持在存储区中，此属性将返回 null。

trans-unit.source: After the principal is persisted, the default enabled setting depends on the store.
trans-unit.target: 保持主体后，默认启用设置取决于存储区。

trans-unit.source: The AD DS and AD LDS stores disable new principals when they are persisted, whereas SAM enables new principals when they are persisted.
trans-unit.target: AD DS 和 AD LDS 存储禁用新的主体时将它们永久保存，而 SAM 使新的主体时将它们永久保存。

trans-unit.source: The application can only set this property to a value after it has been persisted in the store.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序仅可以将此属性设置为一个值后已持久化的存储中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the principal is enabled, or null if the account has not been persisted; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果主体数据库已启用，或者，如果帐户未持久化;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: The application tried to set a null value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序尝试设置此属性的 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Expires the password for this account.
trans-unit.target: 此帐户的密码过期。

trans-unit.source: This will force the user to change his/her password at the next logon.
trans-unit.target: 这将强制用户更改其在下次登录密码。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to force the user to change the password at the next logon.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以强制用户在下次登录时更改密码。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
trans-unit.target: 将所做的更改保存到存储区时发生了异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of authentication principal objects that have an incorrect password try recorded in the specified date and time range.
trans-unit.target: 返回的身份验证的主体对象具有不正确的密码尝试的记录中指定的日期和时间范围的集合。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 时间将默认为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` object as <xref:DateTimeKind.Local>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在本地时间指定的时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`对象作为<xref:DateTimeKind.Local>.</xref:DateTimeKind.Local> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that identifies the date and time of the incorrect password try.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>对象，用于标识的日期和时间不正确密码尝试。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have an incorrect logon try recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的类型参数用于确定返回的对象具有不正确登录尝试的记录的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the `time` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref>枚举值，指定的类型匹配应用于`time`参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%271> that contains one or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref> objects, or an empty collection if no results are found.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%271> ，其中包含一个或多个<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref>对象或如果未不找到任何结果为空集合。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of authentication principal objects that have an account expiration time recorded in the specified date and time range.
trans-unit.target: 返回的已记录在指定的日期和时间范围内的帐户到期时间的身份验证的主体对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 时间将默认为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在本地时间指定的时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`对象作为<xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that identifies the date and time of the account expiration.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>标识的日期和帐户过期时间的对象。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have an account expiration recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的类型参数用于确定返回的对象具有帐户过期记录的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the `time` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref>枚举值，指定的类型匹配应用于`time`参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%601> that contains one or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%601> ，其中包含一个或多个<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that identifies the date and time of the logon record.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>标识的日期和登录记录的时间的对象。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have an account logon recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的类型参数用于确定返回的对象具有帐户登录的记录的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the `time` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref>枚举值，指定的类型匹配应用于`time`参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%601> that contains one or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%601> ，其中包含一个或多个<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of authentication principal objects that have an account password set recorded in the specified date and time range.
trans-unit.target: 返回的身份验证集合具有在指定的日期和时间范围内设置记录帐户密码的主体对象。

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 时间将默认为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在本地时间指定的时间，然后指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`对象作为<xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that identifies the date and time of the password set.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>对象，用于标识的日期和时间设置密码。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have a password set recorded.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的类型参数用于确定返回的对象具有设置密码记录的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the `time` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType"> </xref>枚举值，指定的类型匹配应用于`time`参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%601> that contains one or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%601> ，其中包含一个或多个<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the home directory for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此帐户的主目录。

trans-unit.source: The home directory for this account, or null if no home directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 主目录此帐户，则主目录不存在的情况下为 null。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the home drive for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此帐户的主驱动器。

trans-unit.source: The home drive for the account, or null if no home drive exists.
trans-unit.target: 帐户，则为 null，如果不存在主驱动器主驱动器。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the account is currently locked out.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指定是否帐户当前被锁定。

trans-unit.source: It is possible that an account may not be locked out when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A> returns a non-null value.
trans-unit.target: 可以帐户可能不会被锁定时<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A>返回一个非 null 值。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method computes the correct store-specific lockout value to determine whether the account is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 此方法计算来确定该帐户锁定的正确存储特定锁定值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the account is locked out; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果帐户已被锁定;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the date and time of the last incorrect password attempt on this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可以为 Null <xref:System.DateTime>，对此帐户中指定的日期和时间的最后一次不正确的密码尝试。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。</xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the date and time of the last incorrect password attempt on this account, or null if no incorrect password tries are recorded.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以为 Null <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定的日期和时间的最后一次不正确的密码尝试对此帐户，或不正确的密码尝试记录如果不是 null。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the date and time of the last logon for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可以为 Null <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定的日期和时间的最后一次登录此帐户。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。</xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the date and time of the last logon for this account.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以为 Null <xref:System.DateTime>，它指定的日期和时间的最后一次登录此帐户。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the last date and time that the password was set for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可以为 Null <xref:System.DateTime>，用于指定最后一个日期和时间设置为此帐户的密码。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: As with all <xref:System.DateTime> properties in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>, the time returned is in UTC form.
trans-unit.target: 正如所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: To convert it to local time, call the <xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A> method on the return object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法将返回对象。</xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Nullable <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the last date and time that the password was set for this account.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以为 Null <xref:System.DateTime>，用于指定最后一个日期和时间设置为此帐户的密码。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the password expires for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定的密码是否过期此帐户。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the password expires for this account; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此帐户的密码过期否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether a password is required for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否为此帐户需要密码。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a password is required for this account; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果需要为此帐户; 密码否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the times when the principal can logon.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主体可以登录时的时间。

trans-unit.source: The permitted logon times for this account.
trans-unit.target: 此帐户允许的登录次数。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of workstations that this principal is permitted to log into.
trans-unit.target: 获取此主体允许登录的工作站的列表。

trans-unit.source: The mutable list of workstations that this principal is permitted to log into.
trans-unit.target: 此主体允许登录的工作站可变列表。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes an expired password.
trans-unit.target: 刷新过期的密码。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
trans-unit.target: 将所做的更改保存到存储区时发生了异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the script path for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此帐户的脚本路径。

trans-unit.source: A path of the script for this account, or null if there is no script path.
trans-unit.target: 此帐户或如果没有脚本路径的 null 的脚本的路径。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the account password to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 帐户密码设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The new password.
trans-unit.target: 新密码。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the caller does not have appropriate rights, the new password does not meet password complexity requirements, or for any other reason that the underlying stores reject the password change.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用方没有适当权限、 新密码并不满足密码复杂性要求，或出于任何其他原因，基础存储区拒绝更改的密码，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether a smartcard is required to log on to the account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否需要智能卡登录到帐户。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a smartcard is required to log on to this account; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>智能卡是否要求在登录到此帐户;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Unlocks the account if it is currently locked out.
trans-unit.target: 如果它当前被锁定，请解锁该帐户。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
trans-unit.target: 将所做的更改保存到存储区时发生了异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the user can change the password for this account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定用户是否可以更改此帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this with a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 不使用此操作与<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended for computer principals.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不适合于计算机的主体。

trans-unit.source: Calling this with a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal> will cause a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 调用此操作与<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>将导致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is not permitted to change the password; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果不允许用户更改密码，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: This principal object is not a user.
trans-unit.target: 此主体的对象不是用户。
